kv9.3:1.3_0: Atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:1.5_0: nanu natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:1.7_0: Hañci natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.3:2.1_0: Phasso sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:2.3_0: Rūpaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:3.2_0: saññā cetanā cittaṁ saddhā vīriyaṁ sati samādhi paññā rāgo doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ …pe…
kv9.3:3.3_0: anottappaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:3.5_0: Rūpaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:4.1_0: Rūpaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:4.3_0: Phasso sārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:5.1_0: Rūpaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:5.4_0: anottappaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv9.3:6.6_0: Hañci rūpaṁ sappaccayaṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
